item.title: Join the Team - Now Hiring for an Architectural Designer
item.description: Position: Architectural Designer Location:Houston, TX **Key Responsibilities **We are looking for an individual with a Bachelorâ€™s of Architecture who is interested in residential construction and custom home building. This specific degree is preferred; however please note that favor may be given to those with a higher degree or level of accreditation. At least one year of formal work experience is preferred, and more than that is favored. This individual must be:
